fact.description: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Portugal needs to be cautious. Germany have an attacking throw-in.
Milorad Mazic awards Portugal a goal kick.
Throw-in Portugal.
Germany have been awarded a corner by Milorad Mazic.
Germany to take a throw-in in Portugal territory.
In Salvador Portugal drive forward through Hugo Almeida. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Germany have a goal kick.
Portugal's Cristiano Ronaldo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Germany at Arena Fonte Nova.
Can Portugal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Germany's half?
Portugal drive forward and Cristiano Ronaldo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Salvador Germany attack through Sami Khedira. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Portugal goal kick.
Throw-in for Portugal in their own half.
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Portugal.
Milorad Mazic awards Germany a goal kick.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Germany.
Joao Pereira (Portugal) has received a yellow card from Milorad Mazic.
Can Portugal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Goal! Germany take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Thomas Muller spot-kick..
Milorad Mazic signals a Germany throw-in in Portugal's half.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Portugal at Arena Fonte Nova.
Germany awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Portugal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Germany.
Portugal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Throw-in for Germany in their own half.
Portugal's Nani breaks free at Arena Fonte Nova. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Germany have a goal kick.
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Portugal in their own half.
Hugo Almeida is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Milorad Mazic has blown to resume play in Salvador.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portugal's half?
Paulo Bento (Portugal) has taken off Hugo Almeida who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Eder is the replacement.
Throw-in for Germany at Arena Fonte Nova.
Throw-in Germany.
Free kick Germany.
Ball safe as Portugal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Portugal defence as Mario Gotze fires in a strike for Germany.
Corner awarded to Germany.
Great play from Toni Kroos to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Portugal at Arena Fonte Nova.
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Germany.
Portugal have been awarded a corner by Milorad Mazic.
Portugal's Eder attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Germany at Arena Fonte Nova.
Free kick Germany.
Pepe (Portugal) has been shown a straight red card by referee Milorad Mazic.
Germany's Toni Kroos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Portugal defender.
Corner awarded to Germany.
Mario Gotze of Germany gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Portugal goal kick.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
Germany's Mario Gotze gets in a shot on goal at Arena Fonte Nova. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Portugal goal kick.
Germany take a comfortable 3-0 lead thanks to Thomas Muller.
Throw-in Portugal.
The first half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to Portugal.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Portugal make their second substitution with Ricardo Costa replacing Miguel Veloso.
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Germany.
Germany's Benedikt Howedes has run offside.
Throw-in for Portugal close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Germany is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Milorad Mazic awards Germany a goal kick.
Throw-in for Portugal in their own half.
Mesut Ozil of Germany smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal kick for Germany at Arena Fonte Nova.
In Salvador, Thomas Muller (Germany) misses the target with a header.
Portugal have a goal kick.
Free kick Portugal.
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Milorad Mazic signals a throw-in for Germany, close to Portugal's area.
Free kick in a good position for Portugal!
Portugal to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Portugal) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Portugal have been awarded a corner by Milorad Mazic.
Andre Schurrle is on a sub for Mesut Ozil for Germany.
Germany awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Milorad Mazic waits before resuming play because Fabio Coentrao for Portugal is still down.
The match in Salvador is underway once more.
Portugal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Portugal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Andre Almeida (Portugal) has replaced the possibly injured Fabio Coentrao at Arena Fonte Nova.
Milorad Mazic awards Germany a goal kick.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Portugal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Milorad Mazic signals a Germany throw-in in Portugal's half.
In Salvador, Nani of Portugal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Portugal have been awarded a corner by Milorad Mazic.
Mario Gotze (Germany) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Germany.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portugal's half?
Ball safe as Germany is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match at Arena Fonte Nova has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mats Hummels, who is down injured.
Play has been resumed at Arena Fonte Nova.
Shkodran Mustafi (Germany) has replaced the possibly injured Mats Hummels.
Portugal have a dangerous throw-in.
Portugal push forward through Nani, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Portugal in their own half.
Portugal needs to be cautious. Germany have an attacking throw-in.
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Germany.
Great finish from Thomas Muller to give Germany a 4-0 lead.
Milorad Mazic signals a Portugal throw-in in Germany's half.
Throw-in for Portugal at Arena Fonte Nova.
Germany have a goal kick.
Portugal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Germany make their third substitution with Lukas Podolski replacing Thomas Muller.
Corner awarded to Portugal.
Throw-in Portugal.
Ball goes out of play for a Portugal goal kick.
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Portugal.
In Salvador, Cristiano Ronaldo of Portugal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Portugal to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Portugal to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Can Portugal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Milorad Mazic signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
In Salvador Germany's Andre Schurrle is caught offside.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the second half.
Free kick Portugal.
Portugal's Cristiano Ronaldo is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Portugal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Germany's half?
Throw-in for Portugal at Arena Fonte Nova.
Full-time! The final score is 4-0.
